full_text: Screened by NARA, 9/22/2023 (3) (31) If serving or ever served in the Armed Forces of the United States, give branch NA ; from 19 to 19 and from 19 to 19 inducted or enlisted at ; Service No. ; type of discharge ; ; rank at discharge. ; (Honorable, Dishonorable, etc.) reason for discharge (alienage, conscientious objector, other) Reserve or National Guard from 19 to (32) My occupation is LAB TECHNICIAN List the names, addresses, and occupations (or types of business) of your employers during the last 5 years? He or she was naturalized on NA at ; Certificate No. NA or became a citizen by NA His or her Alien Registration No. is A21 418 726 (34) How many times have you been married?
